subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chris Dickerson hit a game-ending three-run homer with two outs in the ninth, capping a four-run uprising against closer Jose Valverde that carried the Orioles past the Tigers.
snippet: Chris Dickerson hit a game-ending three-run homer with two outs in the ninth, capping a four-run uprising against closer Jose Valverde that carried the Orioles past the Tigers.
